Incorporate these exactly: - **Learning Objectives**: [Paste the full learning_objectives array here]. - **Active Learning**: Use discussion/peer/problem-solving to inspire applied Qs (e.g., scenario-based MCQs). - **Scaffolding Layers**: Distribute cards: 25% Layer 1, 25% Layer 2, 25% Layer 3, 25% Layer 4. - **Content Details**: DIN 66399 P-1 to P-7 as in layers; big picture (CIA confidentiality, asset lifecycle); prior knowledge (data classification); regulations (GDPR/HIPAA); cross-cut vs. strip-cut. Follow **Flashcard Schema** strictly: - Output as JSON array of 50 objects: [{'front': '...', 'back': {'answer': '...', 'explanation': '...', 'bloom_level': '...', 'scaffolding_layer': '...', 'hints': '...'}, 'metadata': {...}, 'type': 'MCQ/Cloze/Short Answer'}] - 60% MCQ (4 options, 1 correct), 20% Cloze, 20% Short Answer. - Distractors per protocol. - Balance Bloom's: 2 per objective. - Ensure university pedagogy: active recall, spaced repetition, misconceptions addressed.
